location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Neil Benjamin Edmonstone, Chief Secretary to Government, Fort William, Calcutta

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Bengal Government that William Bruce has moved out of tents and into new accommodation. It further notes that the rent for the house in question has not yet been established, but that it is expected to get set soon and that rent payments for the old factory will cease the moment the company's woollens are removed from it; a warehouse for company stock is being prepared.
